# kenyaCounties

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/yourusername/kenyaCounties/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/yourusername/kenyaCounties/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package providing comprehensive data about Kenya's 47 county governments.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install from GitHub
devtools::install_github("ymutua/kenyaCounties")

# Install from CRAN (when available)
install.packages("kenyaCounties")
```

## Usage

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(kenyaCounties)

# View datasets
governors
countyGCP
countyPopulation

# Get governor information
get_governor("Nairobi")
list_counties_by_party("ODM")

# Get population data
get_county_population("Nairobi")
get_county_population(county_code = 47)

# Get comprehensive county data
get_county_data("Nairobi", population = TRUE, GCP = TRUE)
get_county_data(c("Nairobi", "Mombasa"), population = TRUE, years = 2019:2021)
get_county_data(county_code = c(1, 2, 47), GCP = TRUE, years = c(2015, 2020))

# County statistics
county_stats()
```

## Data Sources

- Kenya Electoral Commission
- Kenya National Bureau of Statistics
- County Government websites
